sections.title: Have you completed all the forms for your application?

fields.infoText:
You need to send all relevant forms within a 24 hour period, or your application will be rejected.

If you are not ready to send all your forms within this period, you need to save and come back later.

fields.infoText: By sending this form, you declare that the information you have provided is true and complete.
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted form.

You need to send us all of the relevant forms within **24 hours**.

If you do not send us these details in time, you will need to start a new application.

If you have sent us all the relevant details, we will tell you within 60 calendar days if your application has been successful.

If your application is unsuccessful we will tell you why.

**If you need help**

[Check the guidance](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/authorised-economic-operator-certification) to find out: 
- what you need to do while we process your application
- how to make changes to your application
- how to contact HMRC about your application
